DOC.brief_summary: A prospective study designed to access changes in the intracuff pressure of a laryngeal mask airway (LMA) or cuffed endotracheal tube (cETT) during placement of an esophagogastroduodenoscopy (EGD) probe during an EGD in the pediatric population.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of EGD Probe Insertion on the Intracuff Pressure of the Laryngeal Mask Airway or Cuffed Endotracheal Tube in Children
DOC.criteria: Patients from 018 years old having EGD procedure with a LMA or cuffed ETT. Patients with a history of tracheomalacia, bronchomalacia or any other airway issues.
